name: Team Commander
description:
Team Commander (working title) is a roguelike auto-battler where you build up a team of powerful units. Experiment with a variety of unique builds as you battle your way to the top!

Game will be updated at the end of every week, so make sure to come back to check out new fights and try new builds! :)

5/23 

Released game

5/28-29

Planned 5th stage, randomized encounters, and unit/weapon balance

Known bug:

- Valkyrine's HP bar does not change after its second ability is activated.
